title: Wagamama Wanko No Shitsukekata
original_name: ワガママわんこのしつけ方
sinopse:
Kouto, a student in need of money finds a very well-paid part-time job as a pet sitter. So how come he ends up "taking care" of a gorgeous writer, Kyousuke, who apperently wearsa dog's ears and a tail? A twisted story full of cospaly on whole 16 pages. Apart from that, Tsundere, childhood friends, brothers' forbidden love and a full range to choose from.

(Source: M-U)
